summary: Multi-vendor eCommerce mobile app (Alibaba/Daraz-like) for selling mobile phones and electronics, with secure auth, catalog, cart/checkout, order tracking, admin dashboard, search/filter, support, notifications, and required legal/compliance pages for Google Play and Apple App Store.
architectural_notes: Platforms: Android and iOS (implementation options mentioned: Flutter/React Native/Kotlin/Swift).
Backend options: Firebase / Node.js / Laravel / Django; Database options: Firestore / MySQL / MongoDB.
Security requirements: HTTPS, secure APIs, encrypted auth (JWT/OAuth), no plain-text passwords, follow GDPR/data privacy rules.
App must comply with Google Play Store and Apple App Store policies, including mandatory legal pages (Privacy Policy, Terms).
known_issues: Sensitive example admin credentials were provided in conversation; ensure no real credentials are stored in plaintext and do not hardcode credentials in client apps.

existing_features.title: Implement authentication using Internet Identity (II) and require login for purchasing and viewing account/order pages. Provide sign-in/sign-out UI and persist the authenticated session in the frontend.

Implement user profiles in the backend keyed by Principal, including basic fields needed for eCommerce (display name, phone number as optional text, shipping address as optional text, createdAt/updatedAt). Provide frontend screens to view/update the profile.
Create the product catalog data model and APIs: categories, brands, products (with vendor association), product images (as URLs), price, specs, stock availability, and active/inactive status.
Build the product browsing UX: home page, category pages, brand pages, product grid/list, and a product details page with image gallery, price, specifications, and stock status.
Implement a shopping cart system tied to the authenticated user: add/remove items, adjust quantity, compute subtotal, and persist cart state in the backend.

Implement checkout flow with two payment methods: (1) Cash on Delivery (COD) and (2) Stripe card payment. Collect shipping details (from profile or entered at checkout), validate stock at checkout, and create an order.

Implement order management and tracking: order creation from cart, order items snapshot (name/price at purchase), order status lifecycle (e.g., Pending, Confirmed, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled), and a user-facing order history + order detail tracking page.

Create an admin dashboard secured by an admin allowlist of Principals stored in the backend (no hardcoded username/password). Admin features: add/edit/delete products, manage stock, manage orders (update status), view users list (minimal fields), and view basic sales reports (totals by day and by product).
Implement search and filtering for product lists: text search by name, filter by category, brand, and price range, with results reflected in the URL query parameters.

Add a customer support contact form page that lets users submit a support ticket (subject, message, optional order id). Store tickets in the backend and provide an admin view to list and mark tickets as resolved.
Add Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages with professionally structured English content, and link them from the footer and from the sign-in/checkout areas for store compliance.

Add an app shell and brand identity in the UI: app name “ArZang Mobile And Electronic”, business owner name and contact number in an About/Contact page, and consistent header/footer navigation optimized for mobile use.

Define and enforce a professional blue & white eCommerce visual theme (typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across all pages (home, listings, product detail, cart, checkout, account, admin).

Security and privacy baseline: ensure backend authorization checks for all user/admin resources, do not store any plaintext passwords, and avoid embedding the provided example admin credentials anywhere in frontend or backend code.

new_feature_requests.summary: User registration & login (email/phone/Google) with secure authentication
Product catalog with categories/brands (mobiles & electronics) and navigation
Product details page (images, price, specs, stock availability)
Secure checkout with Cash on Delivery and online payments (Stripe/PayPal/local gateways)
Admin panel/dashboard (product CRUD, orders, users, stock management, sales reports)
Customer support chat or contact form
Push notifications for offers and order updates
Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions pages for store compliance
Modern, fast, user-friendly UI (blue/white theme, big product images) similar to Alibaba/Daraz
